Token.Abstract: A location listener receives updates concerning {@link ILPLocation locations}.
Informs this listener that a new {@link ILPLocation location} has been added to the {@link ILPLocationProvider location provider} associated with the application.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The location that was added to the location provider (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Notifies this listener of a failed check-in.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The location at which the failed check-in was to have occurred (should never be nil)

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error that caused the failure (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Notifies this listener of a successful check-in. *

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The location at which the successful check-in occurred (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Informs this listener that a {@link ILPLocation location} previously known to the {@link ILPLocationProvider location provider} associated with the application was deleted from the provider.

Parameter.Name: id_
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier of the location that was deleted (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Informs this listener that the server has determined that the given {@link ILPLocation location} has been entered.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The location that was entered (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Informs this listener that the server has determined that the given {@link ILPLocation location} has been exited.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The location that was exited (should never be nil)

Token.Abstract: Informs this listener that a {@link ILPLocation location} already known to the {@link ILPLocationProvider location provider} associated with the application was modified in some way.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The location that was modified (should never be nil)
